title: Tether Gold Grows with More Than 7.66 Tons of Gold Backing XAU₮ as of Q2 2025, Confirming Continued Strength in Tokenized Gold
content: 24 July 2025 — As of 30 June 2025, Tether Gold (XAU₮) remains the leading gold-backed digital token in the market, combining the enduring trust of physical gold with the efficiency of blockchain technology. With 246,524.330 XAU₮ tokens in circulation, each backed 1:1 by fine troy ounces of physical gold, Tether Gold continues to offer […]

title: Tether Acknowledged by U.S. Authorities for Freezing $1.6M Connected to Terrorism Financing
content: 24 July 2025 – Tether, the largest company in the digital assets industry, announced today that it has assisted U.S. authorities in freezing and reissuing approximately $1.6 million in USDT connected to wallets linked to Buy Cash Money and Money Transfer Company (BuyCash), a Gaza-based financial network tied to terrorist financing operations. The action is […]
